trends: There have been no other sightings in East Liverpool
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughters and I were sitting on my front porch around 9pm, when we saw a brilliant red ,yellow and orange light appear toward the west of us as it got closer to us, it turned a greenish-yellow and shot straight up into the sky.
Summary: {rjl} On june 29th my daughters and I witnessed what was in all terms a ufo...
